about_the_game:
From the team that brought you Sensual Adventures, the Puppetmaster PoseViewer is now available as Version 3.0!

You can now play with the whole cast: Brittany, Trinity, Jasmine, Marcia, Livia, Alexandra, and Richard! The update includes more climaxes, a new environment (that makes nine 3D environments in total), plus over 200 new voiceovers! Enjoy 79 positions and an unlimited combination of character customizations. Setup steamy scenes and watch them from any angle you want... Or let the auto-camera do the work for you 😉 You choose when to cum, who fucks who, and more!

If you're a fan of hot futanari girls you won't want to miss this sensual, interactive experience! Select between pussy or anal penetration, add some other hotties (or maybe clones!) and watch them fuck in this naughty adult porn game. It has everything: orgy, anal, oral, sex toys, strap-ons, rimming, foot jobs, double penetration and so much more. Choose whether or not the girls look at you, when they cum, and even how. There are endless ways to cum again and again with this desktop porn game.

Features:
  • 7 unique characters from Sensual Adventures - Brittany, Trinity, Jasmine, Marcia, Alexandra, Livia, and Richard!
  • 79 Poses!
  • "Look-At Camera" feature for more immersion - They see you ;)
  • New and improved cumshot system!
  • Engine upgrade with better overall look, lighting and reflections, materials and performance
  • 26 Climaxes in total!
  • 1st Person cum shooting - Get them all!
  • Select between anal and pussy penetration
  • Filter and sorting systems for poses
  • 9 unique Environments
  • Day/Night time switching for some environments
  • New "roundabout" turning characters feature
  • Instant character swaps -- Even "self-cest" with clones ;D
  • Girls can wear strap-ons for active positions
  • Great physics, including interaction with cameras & dildos
  • Several performance options, even for low-end systems
  • Body customizations - change skin, hair, eyes, lips, fitness, wetness, and more
  • Accessory customizations with more than 100 assets and unlimited color/material changes for them! Combine them how you like!
  • Customization presets - Save your favorite outfits and apply it to other characters with 1 click
  • Customization for 1st person dildo
  • Auto-cameras for movie-like experience
  • Free cameras you can move anywhere you want
  • POV cameras for great immersion

Please note: to avoid any confusion the title of the game already describes the functionality. It's primarily a simple Pose-Viewer.

name: Puppetmaster - Pose Viewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: INTEL i5, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Puppetmaster Pose-Viewer is the next, new 3DX innovation from the team that brought you Sensual Adventures! This PC-only software application will let you watch and play with Brittany, Trinity, Jasmine, Marcia, Livia and Alexandra in almost any way you like.
